name: superfluid-subgraph
description: Subgraph for the Superfluid Ethereum contracts

scripts.deploy-xdai: mustache config/xdai.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && graph deploy pi0neerpat/superfluid-xdai --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs
scripts.deploy-polygon: mustache config/xdai.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && graph deploy pi0neerpat/superfluid-polygon --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs
scripts.deploy-kovan: mustache config/kovan.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs rtoken-project/rdai-kovan
